sourceMeaningMnemonic: The radical and the kanji for <kanji>door</kanji> are the same!
meaningInfo: Time to open the door to the reading part of this mnemonic.
readingMnemonic: You open the <kanji>door</kanji> and immediately get it closed back on your <reading>toe</reading> (<ja>と</ja>), literally causing your toe to explode.
readingInfo: Feel the pain of your toe going away. Think about the other side of the <kanji>door</kanji>, where your <reading>toe</reading> is probably rolling around after it blasted off your foot.
